Text:
NOT HENTAI!!! ECCHI AT BEST!! 
See my comments from another torrent that I downloaded...

Seriously, there is no reason to state this is uncensored, because THERE'S NOTHING TO CENSOR!!! It's total soft-porn Ecchi at best, and even those parts are no better than what you'd see on late night cable. There's MAYBE a total of 10-20 minutes of 'adult' scenes in this entire series. You could easily edit those out and show the whole thing to the kiddies - it's that juvenile. This is definitely one of the lamest adult-themed movies ever. Don't waste your time on it; you'll be sorry. However, if this is your thing, then here's the specs:

All .avi files with a few screenshots. There are subs on a couple of the episodes, but not on the rest; and they AREN'T available for download as the enclosed file suggests - after all, if they were, then the uploader would have included them, right? So, no porn, and no subs - what's the point? Quality is very good, but the animation is rudimentary, not up to even moderate anime standards.
